mapper.update: update checkin set roomId = #{roomId},roomTypeId = #{roomTypeId},checkinPrice = #{checkinPrice},name = #{name},arriveDate = #{arriveDate},leaveDate = #{leaveDate},idCard = #{idCard},mobile = #{mobile},status = #{status},remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
